title: Could some very good Zeds offer up some knowledge
body:
I don't actually like Zed all that much as a pick but I'm starting to encounter some situations where he could be useful so I picked him up and am completely lost.

What is the most popular Zed build for beginner Zeds?

What is the most basic combo after I Death Mark?

What the fuck do I do when they flash away or jump away after I've ulted and started my combo?

replies.body:
What I do after Death Mark (actually usually before) is to put down my W. That means that if you are skilled, you can hit 3 shurikens and 3 e's. Which is huge damage. AA a few times, then if there are other people, click your R again to get out.

Build: Black Cleaver, BORK, Ghostblade, Ravenous Hydra, etc
Roll face on keyboard, get kill, tell people Zed has high mechanics and skill cap, GG.

Hey mate there are some really good youtube videos on zed. 
Being the super complex champion that he is, there are many variations to zeds full combo 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xtCHRqr-jLU&list=PLUSnJ3s67h75aYRYjudxNGDN0_M7tatEo

This 11 part youtube series helped me out alot

build is generally {{item:3144}}/{{item:3134}} > {{item:3153}} > {{item:3111}} > {{item:3035}} > {{item:3142}} > {{item:3072}}  > {{item:3026}} . I'm honestly not too sure about bt though, I haven't used a conventional build in ages.

last 3 items are usually very situational, if your ahead (by alot) you can grab an ie last whisper and bt/ga, if your doing average hard armor pen is probably your strongest bet, cleaver,last whisper and maybe even a randuins if you feel a little squishy, and if your behind get a hydra and ga and split push
most people build ghostblade and bork to chase down someone if they flash or dash, perfect for popping adc's, also good for split pushing

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dnijTElH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-19T23:40:41.691+0000)
>
> most people build ghostblade and bork to chase down someone if they flash or dash, perfect for popping adc's, also good for split pushing

What do build after that? Last whisper and bt? And then 6th item hydra/maw of mal/ga/black cleaver?

well the shadow distance is pretty much the same as a flash so a w>w should do it(save your combo/try and bait out their flash or jump first)...
and for the ult.... if theres a shuriken above them then they will die from deathmark unless they get healed or cleanse etc

After you Death Mark, you wanna put a shadow behind them, E and then Q.

You use the shadows to dodge their skill shots.

{{champion:238}} Unseen Dildo is the deadliest.

If they flash away, you probably can't do anything unless you reaction time is Godlike.

1. Youmuu's is good for beginners, because it enables you to follow up on your ult and chase ALOT easier, (but personally i use Black Cleaver, for the raw damage).
2. Combo: Ult --> E --> Couple of AA's (if you feel safe about it) --> and Q, (YOU NEED TO HIT YOUR Q, IT IS CRITICAL). Then warp back to your ult shadow.
3. To close the gap after they create it you need to, 1. Counter Flash really quickly, or 2. Use your W, (Which is harder). Also, use your BoTRK passive to close the gap easier.
Hope that helps :). 
I Build: BoTRK, Last Whisper, Ravenous Hydra, Black Cleaver, Mercury Treads + (Guardian Angel/Mercurial Scmitar/Randuins/Banshees). {{champion:238}}
